SqlOperation.Name: GetByNames
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT `Id`, `WorkspaceId`, `UserId`, 'user' as `Kind`, `Name`, `Description`, `Disabled`, `Encrypted`, `Value`, `Created`, `Updated` FROM `sec_user_secrets` WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND `UserId` = @UserId AND `Name` in @Names UNION ALL SELECT `Id`, `WorkspaceId`, '' as UserId, 'workspace' as `Kind`, `Name`, `Description`, `Disabled`, `Encrypted`, `Value`, `Created`, `Updated` FROM `sec_secrets` WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND `Name` in @Names;
